extension.description: Plays random movie trailers from user's library or from a folder. Installs as a Screensaver and a Program. Options to filter by genre, select number of trailers, hide trailers of watched movies, and display opening / closing animations. When viewing trailers you can press UP or I to view movie information and DOWN or I to hide. RIGHT or X will display next trailer. LEFT or ESC will exit.
